name: CakeCrane
description:
Be a baking robot crane. Get ingredients, stuff them into baking bowl, flame them, BAKE CAKES! Have a great time in this relaxing short experience, I mean, what could go wrong? Just bake some cakes.

Controls:

Use left and right mouse buttons.

Made in less than 72 hours as a submission for Mini Jam 66: Sweets

Meet the dev team:

Radim Kratochvíl and Nikita Vaňků   - Game Design & Programming

Kristýna Kazdová - Art Design

Andrej Novosad - Sound & Music Design
